Hi,
Though  I have set the class path for Cactus.properties file..As my
servlet engine does not support web applications, i
have set the CLASSPATH in my servlet engine.... it is throwing the
following exception

java.io.FileNotFoundException:
http://172.20.10.100/PayMate/ServletRedirector
        at
sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLConnection.java:526)

        at
org.apache.commons.cactus.client.ServletHttpClient.doTest(ServletHttpClient.java:109)

        at
org.apache.commons.cactus.ServletTestCase.runGenericTest(ServletTestCase.java:153)

        at
org.apache.commons.cactus.ServletTestCase.runTest(ServletTestCase.java:128)

        at
org.apache.commons.cactus.AbstractTestCase.runBare(AbstractTestCase.java:266)

[Note:I have followed the steps given in
commons-cactus-23-20010502\doc\installation.html]

 i have set in the properties file
like.."http://172.20.10.100/PayMate/ServletRedirector"
regards
sandhya sree
subject: reply soon
